wmndsInputProps.name: id
wmndsInputProps.description: Required. Must be unique. The id of the input.

wmndsInputProps.name: name
wmndsInputProps.description: Required. The name of the input, which is submitted with the form data.

wmndsInputProps.name: type
wmndsInputProps.description: Type of input control to render. Defaults to text.

wmndsInputProps.name: required
wmndsInputProps.description: If true, input is required/must be filled out. Defaults to false.

wmndsInputProps.name: error
wmndsInputProps.description: If true, error will be displayed. Defaults to false.

wmndsInputProps.name: errorMessage
wmndsInputProps.description: Options for the error message component. See errorMessage.

arrayOptions.name: id
arrayOptions.description: Id attribute to add to the error message span tag.

arrayOptions.name: contentText
arrayOptions.description: Required. Text to use within the error message. If contentHTML is supplied, this is ignored.

arrayOptions.name: contentHTML
arrayOptions.description: Required. HTML to use within the error message

arrayOptions.name: classes
arrayOptions.description: Classes to add to the error message span tag.

wmndsInputProps.name: label
wmndsInputProps.description: Required. Options for the label component. See label.

arrayOptions.name: contentText
arrayOptions.description: Required. If `contentHTML` is set, this is not required. Text to use within the label. If `contentHTML` is provided, the `contentText` argument will be ignored.

arrayOptions.name: contentHTML
arrayOptions.description: Required. If `contentText` is set, this is not required. HTML to use within the label. If `contentHTML` is provided, the `contentText` argument will be ignored.

arrayOptions.name: classes
arrayOptions.description: Classes to add to the label tag.

wmndsInputProps.name: formGroup
wmndsInputProps.description: Options for the form-group wrapper. See formGroup options below.

arrayOptions.name: classes
arrayOptions.description: Classes to add to the form group (e.g. to show error state for the whole group)

wmndsInputProps.name: attributes
wmndsInputProps.description: Attribute to identify input purpose, for instance postal-code or username. See autofill for full list of attributes that can be used.

arrayOptions.name: disabled
arrayOptions.description: If true, input should be disabled. Defaults to false.

arrayOptions.name: maxLength
arrayOptions.description: The maxLength is the maximum number of characters allowed in the input. It's an optional field.

arrayOptions.name: placeholder
arrayOptions.description: Placeholder is a short hint that describes the expected value of a input. It's an optional field.

arrayOptions.name: value
arrayOptions.description: Optional initial value of the input.
